ai.summary: Fox's Path is a short, easy 3.3 km hike in the UK designed for beginners. The route offers light countryside scenery with a gentle pace and minimal elevation, making it suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily level or gently rolling, the trail uses well-maintained paths with occasional grass, gravel, and muddy patches after rain. Expect mild ascents in some sections and gates or stiles at field boundaries.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight; wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing; stay on marked paths; mind gates and livestock; carry water and a snack; carry a map and/or GPS and a fully charged phone; mobile signal can be patchy in rural areas; inform someone of your plans; be prepared for muddy or slippery sections in winter.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or lightweight boots
Map and/or GPS device (or offline map on your phone)
Phone with emergency contacts and portable charger
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal; the route is accessible year-round with proper footwear and wet-weather gear, though winter conditions can be wetter and colder.

seo.title: Fox's Path - Easy 3.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Fox's Path, a short and easy 3.3 km hike in the UK. Gentle terrain for beginners, practical safety tips, and the best seasons to visit.
seo.h1: Fox's Path - 3.3 km Easy Hike in the UK
